sentence: Kidus Girma, a 26-year-old Sunrise Movement activist who helped organize protests against Manchin this past fall, calls him the final villain.? Tom Williams/CQ Roll Call/AP Images Manchin's influence comes from the fact that in an evenly divided Senate, he is the swing vote that can make or break legislation.
author: Jeff Goodell
title: Manchin's Coal Corruption Is So Much Worse Than You Knew

title: Sens. Joe Manchin and Lisa Murkowski crossed party lines and endorsed each other during a joint interview
